usage: Used for strength training, toning, and resistance exercises at home, in fitness classes, or in small workout spaces.
key_features: Pair of 1 KG dumbbells for a total of 2 KG resistance
Cast iron core with neoprene coating for durability and safety
Anti-slip neoprene surface for a secure, comfortable grip
Printed weight and brand marking on end caps for easy identification
Color-coded pink design to quickly distinguish weight
Hexagonal ends prevent dumbbells from rolling on the floor
Suitable for home gyms, fitness classes, and general resistance training
Non-toxic guarantee badge shown for added material safety assurance
ai_description: Pink KAKSS neoprene dumbbells, 1 KG each, feature a cast iron core with anti-slip coating and hexagonal ends to prevent rolling. Printed weight and brand markings aid quick ID, ideal for safe, non-toxic home and studio workouts.
target_audience: Home exercisers, beginners, and fitness enthusiasts seeking light hand weights for workouts, classes, or rehabilitation routines.
product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells 1+1=2 KG Pack of 1 KG Each, Anti-Slip Coated Hand Weights for Home Gym & Fitness Training - Pink
